original_text: Now there were some present at that time who told Jesus about the Galileans whose blood Pilate had mixed with their sacrifices.
korean_text: 그 때 마침 두어 사람이 와서 빌라도가 어떤 갈릴리 사람들의 피를 그들의 제물에 섞은 일로 예수께 아뢰니

sentences.original_text: Now there were some present at that time
sentences.korean_translation: 그 때에 어떤 사람들이 거기에 있었는데

sentences.original_text: who told Jesus about the Galileans
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 예수님께 갈릴리 사람들에 대해 말했다

sentences.original_text: whose blood Pilate had mixed with their sacrifices
